title: Deprecated APIs and features
contents:
mode_edit

已棄用的 API 和特性link

Deprecated APIs and featureslink

Angular 力圖兼顧創新與穩定。但有時，API 和特性已經過時，需要進行刪除或替換，以便 Angular 可以及時跟上新的最佳實踐、依賴項變更或者 Web 平台自身的變化。

Angular strives to balance innovation and stability. Sometimes, APIs and features become obsolete and need to be removed or replaced so that Angular can stay current with new best practices, changing dependencies, or changes in the (web) platform itself.

為了使這些轉換儘可能簡單，API 和特性在被刪除之前會被棄用一段時間。這讓你有時間將應用程式更新到最新的 API 和最佳實踐。

To make these transitions as easy as possible, APIs and features are deprecated for a period of time before they are removed. This gives you time to update your applications to the latest APIs and best practices.

本指南包含了當前已棄用的所有 Angular API 和特性的彙總表。

This guide contains a summary of all Angular APIs and features that are currently deprecated.

在 v6 或更早版本中已棄用的特性和 API 將在版本 9 或任何更高的主版本中移除。有關 Angular 棄用和移除實踐的資訊，參閱Angular 釋出實踐。

Features and APIs that were deprecated in v6 or earlier are candidates for removal in version 9 or any later major version. For information about Angular's deprecation and removal practices, see Angular Release Practices.

關於如何更新到最新 Angular 版本的分步說明，參閱 update.angular.io 上的互動式更新指南。

For step-by-step instructions on how to update to the latest Angular release, use the interactive update guide at update.angular.io.

索引link

Indexlink

為幫助你的專案面向未來，下表列出了所有已棄用的 API 和特性，並按它們將被移除的候選版本進行組織。每個專案都連結到本指南後面描述棄用原因和替換選項的部分。

To help you future-proof your projects, the following table lists all deprecated APIs and features, organized by the release in which they are candidates for removal. Each item is linked to the section later in this guide that describes the deprecation reason and replacement options.

可以在 v11 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v11 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/common ReflectiveInjector v8 v11
@angular/common CurrencyPipe - DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE v9 v11
@angular/core DefaultIterableDiffer v7 v11
@angular/core ReflectiveKey v8 v11
@angular/core RenderComponentType v7 v11
@angular/core defineInjectable v8 v11
@angular/core entryComponents v9 v11
@angular/core ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS v9 v11
@angular/forms 具有響應式表單的 ngModelngModel with reactive forms v6 v11
@angular/upgrade @angular/upgrade v8 v11
@angular/upgrade getAngularLib v8 v11
@angular/upgrade setAngularLib v8 v11
Polyfill指令碼polyfills reflect-metadata v8 v11
範本語法template syntax <template> v7 v11

可以在 v12 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v12 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/core/testing TestBed.get v9 v12
@angular/core/testing async v9 v12

可以在 v14 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v14 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/forms FormBuilder.group 舊版 options 引數FormBuilder.group legacy options parameter v11 v14

可以在 v15 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v15 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/common/http XhrFactory v12 v15
@angular/compiler-cli 輸入設定器強制型別轉換Input setter coercion v13 v15
@angular/compiler-cli fullTemplateTypeCheck v13 v15
@angular/core ApplicationRef.bootstrap 的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of ApplicationRef.bootstrap v13 v15
@angular/core PlatformRef.bootstrapModuleFactory v13 v15
@angular/core ViewContainerRef.createComponent 的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of ViewContainerRef.createComponent v13 v15
@angular/platform-server renderModuleFactory v13 v15
@angular/upgrade downgradeModule 的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of downgradeModule v13 v15
範本語法template syntax bind-, on-, bindon-, and ref- v13 v15

可以在 v16 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v16 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/common/http/testing TestRequest 接受 ErrorEvent 進行錯誤模擬TestRequest accepting ErrorEvent for error simulation v13 v16
@angular/core getModuleFactory v13 v16
@angular/core ModuleWithComponentFactories v13 v16
@angular/core Compiler v13 v16
@angular/core CompilerFactory v13 v16
@angular/core NgModuleFactory v13 v16
@angular/core ComponentFactory v13 v16
@angular/core ComponentFactoryResolver v13 v16
@angular/core CompilerOptions.useJit and CompilerOptions.missingTranslation config options v13 v16
@angular/platform-browser BrowserTransferStateModule v14 v16
@angular/platform-browser-dynamic JitCompilerFactory v13 v16
@angular/platform-browser-dynamic RESOURCE_CACHE_PROVIDER v13 v16
@angular/platform-server ServerTransferStateModule v14 v16
@angular/router relativeLinkResolution v14 v16
@angular/router RouterOutletContract.activateWith 中的 resolver 引數resolver argument in RouterOutletContract.activateWith v14 v16
@angular/router OutletContext 類別的 resolver 欄位resolver field of the OutletContext class v14 v16
@angular/service-worker SwUpdate#activated v13 v16
@angular/service-worker SwUpdate#available v13 v16

可以在 v17 或更高版本中刪除的已棄用特性link

Deprecated features that can be removed in v17 or laterlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
@angular/common NgComponentOutlet.ngComponentOutletNgModuleFactory v14 v17
@angular/common DatePipe - DATE_PIPE_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE v15 v17
@angular/core 用於 providedIn 中的 NgModule 和 'any' 選項NgModule and 'any' options for providedIn v15 v17
@angular/router RouterLinkWithHref 指令RouterLinkWithHref directive v15 v17

沒有計劃刪除版本的過時特性link

Deprecated features with no planned removal versionlink

特性區Area API 或特性API or Feature 已棄用於Deprecated in 可能會移除於May be removed in
範本語法template syntax /deep/, >>>, and ::ng-deep v7 unspecified

有關 Angular 元件開發工具套件 (CDK) 和 Angular Material 棄用的資訊，請參閱更改日誌。

For information about Angular Component Development Kit (CDK) and Angular Material deprecations, see the changelog.

已棄用的 APIlink

Deprecated APIslink

本節包含所有已棄用的 API 的完整列表，以及可幫助你計劃遷移到替代方案的詳細資訊。

This section contains a complete list all deprecated APIs, with details to help you plan your migration to a replacement.

提示：
在本網站的API 參考部分，已棄用的 API 由刪除線標出。你可以按狀態: 已棄用過濾 API 列表。

TIP:
In the API reference section of this site, deprecated APIs are indicated by strikethrough. You can filter the API list by Status: deprecated.

@angular/commonlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
CurrencyPipe - DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE {provide: DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE, useValue: 'USD'} v9 從 v11 開始，預設程式碼是從 LOCALE_ID 給出的區域設定資料中提取的，而不是 USD 。From v11 the default code is extracted from the locale data given by LOCALE_ID, rather than USD.
NgComponentOutlet.ngComponentOutletNgModuleFactory NgComponentOutlet.ngComponentOutletNgModule v14 改用 ngComponentOutletNgModule 輸入。此輸入不需要解析 NgModule 工廠。Use the ngComponentOutletNgModule input instead. This input doesn't require resolving NgModule factory.
DatePipe - DATE_PIPE_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE { provide: DATE_PIPE_DEFAULT_OPTIONS, useValue: { timezone: '-1200' } v15 使用 DATE_PIPE_DEFAULT_OPTIONS 注入令牌，它可以改為一次配置多個設定。Use the DATE_PIPE_DEFAULT_OPTIONS injection token, which can configure multiple settings at once instead.

@angular/common/httplink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
XhrFactory @angular/common 中的 XhrFactoryXhrFactory in @angular/common v12 XhrFactory 已從 @angular/common/http 移到了 @angular/common。The XhrFactory has moved from @angular/common/http to @angular/common.

@angular/corelink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
DefaultIterableDiffer 不適用n/a v4 不再是公共 API。Not part of public API.
ReflectiveInjector Injector.create() v5 請參閱ReflectiveInjectorSee ReflectiveInjector
ReflectiveKey 沒了none v5 沒了none
defineInjectable ɵɵdefineInjectable v8 僅在產生的程式碼中使用。任何原始碼都不應依賴此 API。Used only in generated code. No source code should depend on this API.
entryComponents 沒了none v9 參見 entryComponentsSee entryComponents
ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS 沒了none v9 See ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS
async waitForAsync v11 @angular/core/testing 中的async函式已重新命名為 waitForAsync ，以避免與本機 JavaScript async 語法混淆。現有的函式已被棄用，可以在未來的版本中刪除。The async function from @angular/core/testing has been renamed to waitForAsync in order to avoid confusion with the native JavaScript async syntax. The existing function is deprecated and can be removed in a future version.
getModuleFactory getNgModuleById v13 Ivy 允許直接使用 NgModule 類，而無需檢索相應的工廠。Ivy allows working with NgModule classes directly, without retrieving corresponding factories.
ViewChildren.emitDistinctChangesOnly / ContentChildren.emitDistinctChangesOnly 無（是問題 #40091的一部分）none (was part of issue #40091) 這是作為問題 #40091的錯誤修復的一部分引入的臨時標誌，將被刪除。This is a temporary flag introduced as part of bug fix of issue #40091 and will be removed.
ApplicationRef.bootstrap的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of ApplicationRef.bootstrap ApplicationRef.bootstrap的基於型別的簽名Type-based signature of ApplicationRef.bootstrap v13 有了 ivy，不需要解析 Component factory，直接提供 Component Type 即可。With Ivy, there is no need to resolve Component factory and Component Type can be provided directly.
PlatformRef.bootstrapModuleFactory PlatformRef.bootstrapModule v13 有了 ivy，就不需要解析 NgModule factory，直接提供 NgModule Type 即可。With Ivy, there is no need to resolve NgModule factory and NgModule Type can be provided directly.
ModuleWithComponentFactories 沒了none v13 Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取此符號。有關其他上下文，參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
Compiler 沒了none v13 Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取此符號。有關其他上下文，參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
CompilerFactory 沒了none v13 Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取此符號。有關其他上下文，參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
NgModuleFactory 使用不基於工廠的框架 API，例如 PlatformRef.bootstrapModule 和 createNgModuleUse non-factory based framework APIs like PlatformRef.bootstrapModule and createNgModule v13 Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取此符號。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
ViewContainerRef.createComponent 的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of ViewContainerRef.createComponent ViewContainerRef.createComponent 的基於型別的簽名Type-based signature of ViewContainerRef.createComponent v13 Angular 不再需要元件工廠動態建立元件。使用 createComponent 方法的不同簽名，該方法允許直接傳遞 Component 類別。Angular no longer requires component factories to dynamically create components. Use different signature of the createComponent method, which allows passing Component class directly.
ComponentFactory 使用不基於工廠的框架 API。Use non-factory based framework APIs. v13 從 Ivy 開始，就不需要元件工廠。Angular 提供了其他可以直接使用元件類別的 API。Since Ivy, Component factories are not required. Angular provides other APIs where Component classes can be used directly.
ComponentFactoryResolver 使用不基於工廠的框架 API。Use non-factory based framework APIs. v13 由於 Ivy，不需要元件工廠，因此無需解析它們。Since Ivy, Component factories are not required, thus there is no need to resolve them.
CompilerOptions.useJit and CompilerOptions.missingTranslation config options 沒了none v13 由於 Ivy，這些配置選項未使用，傳遞它們是沒有效果的。Since Ivy, those config options are unused, passing them has no effect.
使用 NgModule 的 providedInprovidedIn with NgModule 建議改用 'root' 提供者，如果必須使用，則使用 NgModule 中的 providers 來定義Prefer 'root' providers, or use NgModule providers if scoping to an NgModule is necessary v15 無none
providedIn: 'any' 沒了none v15 該選項具有容易混淆的語義，並且幾乎沒人用過。This option has confusing semantics and nearly zero usage.

@angular/core/testinglink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
TestBed.get TestBed.inject v9 行為沒變，但型別安全。Same behavior, but type safe.
async waitForAsync v10 行為相同，只是改名以免混淆。Same behavior, but rename to avoid confusion.

@angular/routerlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
RouterOutletContract.activateWith 中的 resolver 引數resolver argument in RouterOutletContract.activateWith 無需更換No replacement needed v14 元件工廠不需要動態建立元件的例項。不再需要透過 resolver 引數傳遞工廠解析器。Component factories are not required to create an instance of a component dynamically. Passing a factory resolver via resolver argument is no longer needed.
OutletContext 類別的 resolver 欄位resolver field of the OutletContext class 無需更換No replacement needed v14 元件工廠不需要動態建立元件的例項。不再需要透過 resolver 類欄位傳遞工廠解析器。Component factories are not required to create an instance of a component dynamically. Passing a factory resolver via resolver class field is no longer needed.
RouterLinkWithHref 指令RouterLinkWithHref directive 改用 RouterLink 。Use RouterLink instead. v15 RouterLinkWithHref 指令程式碼已合併到 RouterLink 中。現在， RouterLink 指令可用於所有具有 routerLink 屬性的元素。The RouterLinkWithHref directive code was merged into RouterLink. Now the RouterLink directive can be used for all elements that have routerLink attribute.
provideRoutes 函式provideRoutes function 改用 ROUTES InjectionToken 。Use ROUTES InjectionToken instead. v15 provideRoutes 這個幫助器函式的用處很小，由於和 provideRouter 拼寫相似，可能會無意間用錯。The provideRoutes helper function is minimally useful and can be unintentionally used instead of provideRouter due to similar spelling.

@angular/platform-browserlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
BrowserTransferStateModule 無需更換。No replacement needed. v14.1 TransferState 類無需匯入額外的模組即可用於在伺服器端渲染應用的客戶端進行注入。The TransferState class is available for injection without importing additional modules on the client side of a server-rendered application.

@angular/platform-browser-dynamiclink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
JitCompilerFactory 沒了none v13 此符號不再需要。有關其他上下文，參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。This symbol is no longer necessary. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
RESOURCE_CACHE_PROVIDER 沒了none v13 以前，在某些情況下，要使用 View Engine 測試 AOT 編譯的元件，這是必要的，但從 Ivy 開始就不再是這樣了。This was previously necessary in some cases to test AOT-compiled components with View Engine, but is no longer since Ivy.

@angular/platform-serverlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
renderModuleFactory renderModule v13 此符號不再需要。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用導致的 JIT API 更改。This symbol is no longer necessary. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
ServerTransferStateModule 無需更換。No replacement needed. v14.1 當已匯入 ServerModule 或 使用 renderApplication 函式進行引導時，TransferState 類無需匯入額外的模組即在伺服器端渲染期間使用。The TransferState class is available for injection without importing additional modules during server side rendering, when ServerModule is imported or renderApplication function is used for bootstrap.

@angular/formslink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
與響應式表單一起使用的 ngModelngModel with reactive forms FormControlDirective v6 沒了none
FormBuilder.group 舊版 options 引數FormBuilder.group legacy options parameter AbstractControlOptions 引數值AbstractControlOptions parameter value v11 沒了none

@angular/service-workerlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
SwUpdate#activated SwUpdate#activateUpdate() 的返回值SwUpdate#activateUpdate() return value v13 SwUpdate#activateUpdate() 的返回值指示更新是否成功啟用。The return value of SwUpdate#activateUpdate() indicates whether an update was successfully activated.
SwUpdate#available SwUpdate#versionUpdates v13 可以透過過濾SwUpdate#versionUpdates上的 VersionReadyEvent 事件來重建 SwUpdate#available 的行為The behavior of SwUpdate#available can be rebuilt by filtering for VersionReadyEvent events on SwUpdate#versionUpdates

@angular/upgradelink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
所有入口點All entry points @angular/upgrade/static v5 參閱從 AngularJS 升級。See Upgrading from AngularJS.

@angular/upgrade/staticlink

API 替代品Replacement 已宣佈棄用Deprecation announced 詳情Details
getAngularLib getAngularJSGlobal v5 參閱從 AngularJS 升級。See Upgrading from AngularJS.
setAngularLib setAngularJSGlobal v5 參閱從 AngularJS 升級。See Upgrading from AngularJS.
downgradeModule 的基於工廠的簽名Factory-based signature of downgradeModule downgradeModule 的基於 NgModule 的簽名NgModule-based signature of downgradeModule v13 downgradeModule 支援更符合人體工程學的基於 NgModule 的 API（與基於 NgModule 工廠的 API 相比）。The downgradeModule supports more ergonomic NgModule-based API (versus NgModule factory based API).

已棄用的特性link

Deprecated featureslink

本節列出了所有已棄用的特性，包括範本語法、配置選項以及“已棄用的API ”部分中未列出的任何其他棄用。它還包括已棄用的 API 使用場景或 API 組合，以擴充上面的資訊。

This section lists all deprecated features, which includes template syntax, configuration options, and any other deprecations not listed in the Deprecated APIs section. It also includes deprecated API usage scenarios or API combinations, to augment the information above.

Bazel 建構器和原理圖link

Bazel builder and schematicslink

Angular Labs 中引入了 Bazel 建構器和原理圖，讓使用者無需管理 Bazel 版本和 BUILD 檔案即可試用 Bazel。此特性已被棄用。有關更多資訊，參閱遷移文件。

Bazel builder and schematics were introduced in Angular Labs to let users try out Bazel without having to manage Bazel version and BUILD files. This feature has been deprecated. For more information, please refer to the migration doc.

Web 追蹤框架整合link

Web Tracing Framework integrationlink

Angular 以前支援與Web 追蹤框架 (WTF)整合，以對 Angular 應用程式進行效能測試。此整合未經維護，現已失效。因此，該整合在 Angular 版本 8 中被棄用，並且由於沒有任何現有使用的證據，因此在版本 9 中被刪除。

Angular previously supported an integration with the Web Tracing Framework (WTF) for performance testing of Angular applications. This integration has not been maintained and is now defunct. As a result, the integration was deprecated in Angular version 8, and due to no evidence of any existing usage, removed in version 9.

/deep/ 、 >>> 和 ::ng-deep 元件樣式選擇器link

/deep/, >>>, and ::ng-deep component style selectorslink

不推薦使用 shadow-dom-piercing 後代組合器，並且正在從主要瀏覽器和工具中刪除支援。因此，在 v4 中，已棄用 Angular 對 /deep/ 、 >>> 和 ::ng-deep 的支援。在刪除之前，首選 ::ng-deep ，因為它與這些工具具有更廣泛的相容性。

The shadow-dom-piercing descendant combinator is deprecated and support is being removed from major browsers and tools. As such, in v4, Angular's support for /deep/, >>>, and ::ng-deep was deprecated. Until removal, ::ng-deep is preferred for broader compatibility with the tools.

有關更多資訊，參閱元件樣式指南中的/deep/、>>> 和 ::ng-deep。

For more information, see /deep/, >>>, and ::ng-deep in the Component Styles guide.

bind- 、 on- 、 bindon- 和 ref- 字首link

bind-, on-, bindon-, and ref- prefixeslink

範本字首 bind- 、 on- 、 bindon- 和 ref- 在 v13 中已被棄用。範本應該使用更廣為人知的語法進行繫結和參考：

The template prefixes bind-, on-, bindon-, and ref- have been deprecated in v13. Templates should use the more widely documented syntaxes for binding and references:

  • [input]="value" 代替 bind-input="value"

    [input]="value" instead of bind-input="value"

  • [@trigger]="value" 代替 bind-animate-trigger="value"

    [@trigger]="value" instead of bind-animate-trigger="value"

  • (click)="onClick()" 代替 on-click="onClick()"

    (click)="onClick()" instead of on-click="onClick()"

  • [(ngModel)]="value" 代替 bindon-ngModel="value"

    [(ngModel)]="value" instead of bindon-ngModel="value"

  • #templateRef 代替 ref-templateRef

    #templateRef instead of ref-templateRef

<template> 標籤link

<template> taglink

<template> 標籤在 v4 中已被棄用，以避免與同名的 DOM 元素衝突（例如使用 Web 元件時）。改用 <ng-template> 。有關更多資訊，請參閱Ahead-of-Time 編譯指南。

The <template> tag was deprecated in v4 to avoid colliding with a DOM element of the same name (such as when using web components). Use <ng-template> instead. For more information, see the Ahead-of-Time Compilation guide.

和響應式表單一起使用 ngModellink

ngModel with reactive formslink

在 Angular v6 中已不推薦把 ngModel 輸入屬性、ngModelChange 事件與響應式表單指令一起使用，並將在 Angular 的未來版本中刪除。

Support for using the ngModel input property and ngModelChange event with reactive form directives has been deprecated in Angular v6 and can be removed in a future version of Angular.

現在已經棄用：

Now deprecated:

<input [formControl]="control" [(ngModel)]="value"> this.value = 'some value';

出於多種原因，此支援已被棄用。首先，開發人員發現這種模式令人困惑。似乎正在使用實際的 ngModel 指令，但實際上它是響應式表單指令上名為 ngModel 的輸入/輸出屬性，它模擬了該指令的一些行為，但又不完全一樣。它允許獲取和設定值並攔截值事件，但 ngModel 的一些特性，比如使用 ngModelOptions 延遲更新或匯出指令，不起作用。

This support was deprecated for several reasons. First, developers found this pattern confusing. It seems like the actual ngModel directive is being used, but in fact it's an input/output property named ngModel on the reactive form directive that approximates some, but not all, of the directive's behavior. It allows getting and setting a value and intercepting value events, but some ngModel features, such as delaying updates withngModelOptions or exporting the directive, don't work.

另外，該模式混用了範本驅動和響應式這兩種表單策略，這會妨礙我們獲取任何一種策略的全部優點。在範本中設定值的方式，也違反了響應式表單所遵循的“範本無關”原則；反之，在類中新增 FormControl/FormGroup 層也破壞了“在範本中定義表單”的約定。

In addition, this pattern mixes template-driven and reactive forms strategies, which prevents taking advantage of the full benefits of either strategy. Setting the value in the template violates the template-agnostic principles behind reactive forms, whereas adding a FormControl/FormGroup layer in the class removes the convenience of defining forms in the template.

要在刪除支援之前更新你的程式碼，請決定是堅持使用響應式表單指令（以及使用響應式表單模式獲取/設定值）或切換到範本驅動的指令。

To update your code before support is removed, decide whether to stick with reactive form directives (and get/set values using reactive forms patterns) or switch to template-driven directives.

之後（選擇 1 - 使用響應式表單）：

After (choice 1 - use reactive forms):

<input [formControl]="control"> this.control.setValue('some value');

之後（選擇 2 - 使用範本驅動表單）：

After (choice 2 - use template-driven forms):

<input [(ngModel)]="value"> this.value = 'some value';

預設情況下，當你使用此模式時，你會在開發模式下收到一次棄用警告。你可以選擇透過在匯入時配置 ReactiveFormsModule 來消除此警告：

By default, when you use this pattern, you get a deprecation warning once in dev mode. You can choose to silence this warning by configuring ReactiveFormsModule at import time:

imports: [ ReactiveFormsModule.withConfig({warnOnNgModelWithFormControl: 'never'}) ],

或者，你可以選擇為該模式的每個例項顯示一個單獨的警告，配置值為 "always"。這可能有助於在更新程式碼時追蹤程式碼中使用模式的位置。

Alternatively, you can choose to surface a separate warning for each instance of this pattern with a configuration value of "always". This may help to track down where in the code the pattern is being used as the code is being updated.

ReflectiveInjectorlink

在版本 5 中，Angular 用 StaticInjector 代替了 ReflectiveInjector。該注入器不再需要 Reflect 的Polyfill指令碼，對大部分開發人員來說都顯著減小了應用的體積。

In version 5, Angular replaced the ReflectiveInjector with the StaticInjector. The injector no longer requires the Reflect polyfill, reducing application size for most developers.

之前：

Before:

ReflectiveInjector.resolveAndCreate(providers);

之後：

After:

Injector.create({providers});

relativeLinkResolution 選項已棄用並被刪除。在版本 11 中，預設行為已更改為正確的行為。刪除 relativeLinkResolution 後，始終使用正確的行為，而沒有使用破損行為的選項。

The relativeLinkResolution option is deprecated and being removed. In version 11, the default behavior was changed to the correct one. After relativeLinkResolution is removed, the correct behavior is always used without an option to use the broken behavior.

在 v14 中添加了開發模式警告，以警告建立的 UrlTree 依賴於 relativeLinkResolution: 'legacy' 選項。

A dev mode warning was added in v14 to warn if a created UrlTree relies on the relativeLinkResolution: 'legacy' option.

loadChildren 字串語法link

loadChildren string syntaxlink

當 Angular 第一次引入惰性路由時，還沒有瀏覽器能支援動態載入額外的 JavaScript。因此 Angular 使用語法 loadChildren: './lazy/lazy.module#LazyModule' 並且還建構了一些工具來支援它。現在，很多瀏覽器都已支援 ECMAScript 的動態匯入，Angular 也正朝著這個新語法前進。

When Angular first introduced lazy routes, there wasn't browser support for dynamically loading additional JavaScript. Angular created its own scheme using the syntax loadChildren: './lazy/lazy.module#LazyModule' and built tooling to support it. Now that ECMAScript dynamic import is supported in many browsers, Angular is moving toward this new syntax.

在版本 8 中，已棄用 loadChildren 路由規範的字串語法，而是改用基於 import() 的新語法。

In version 8, the string syntax for the loadChildren route specification was deprecated, in favor of new syntax that uses import() syntax.

之前：

Before:

const routes: Routes = [{ path: 'lazy', // The following string syntax for loadChildren is deprecated loadChildren: './lazy/lazy.module#LazyModule', }];

之後：

After:

const routes: Routes = [{ path: 'lazy', // The new import() syntax loadChildren: () => import('./lazy/lazy.module').then(m => m.LazyModule) }];

版本 8 更新：當你更新到版本 8 時，ng update 命令會自動執行轉換。在版本 7 之前，import() 語法僅適用於 JIT 模式（使用檢視引擎）。

Version 8 update: When you update to version 8, the ng update command performs the transformation automatically. Prior to version 7, the import() syntax only works in JIT mode (with view engine).

宣告語法：
遵循路由宣告語法 loadChildren: () => import('...').then(m => m.ModuleName) 很重要，這樣 ngc 才能發現延遲載入的模組和關聯的 NgModule。你可以在此處找到允許的語法結構的完整列表。這些限制將隨著 Ivy 的釋出而放寬，因為它將不再使用 NgFactories。

Declaration syntax:
It's important to follow the route declaration syntax loadChildren: () => import('...').then(m => m.ModuleName) to allow ngc to discover the lazy-loaded module and the associated NgModule. You can find the complete list of allowed syntax constructs here. These restrictions will be relaxed with the release of Ivy since it'll no longer use NgFactories.

JIT 模式下對反射元資料 polyfill 的依賴link

Dependency on a reflect-metadata polyfill in JIT modelink

Angular 應用程式，特別是依賴於 JIT 編譯器的應用程式，過去常常需要 reflect-metadata API 的Polyfill指令碼。

Angular applications, and specifically applications that relied on the JIT compiler, used to require a polyfill for the reflect-metadata APIs.

在 Angular 8.0 版（見#14473）中移除了對這個Polyfill指令碼的需求，這將使得大多數 Angular 應用程式不再需要此Polyfill指令碼。因為此Polyfill指令碼可能被第三方庫依賴，因此不能從所有 Angular 專案中刪除它，我們從 8.0 版本開始棄用對這個Polyfill指令碼的要求。這樣可以給庫作者和應用程式開發人員足夠的時間來評估他們是否需要此Polyfill指令碼，並執行任何必要的重構以消除對它的依賴。

The need for this polyfill was removed in Angular version 8.0 (see #14473), rendering the presence of the polyfill in most Angular applications unnecessary. Because the polyfill can be depended on by third-party libraries, instead of removing it from all Angular projects, we are deprecating the requirement for this polyfill as of version 8.0. This should give library authors and application developers sufficient time to evaluate if they need the polyfill, and perform any refactoring necessary to remove the dependency on it.

在典型的 Angular 專案中，這個Polyfill指令碼不用於生產版本，因此刪除它不會影響生產環境的應用程式。刪除它是為了從整體上上簡化建構設定並減少外部依賴項的數量。

In a typical Angular project, the polyfill is not used in production builds, so removing it should not impact production applications. The goal behind this removal is overall simplification of the build setup and decrease in the number of external dependencies.

@ViewChild() / @ContentChild() 預設使用靜態解析link

@ViewChild() / @ContentChild() static resolution as the defaultlink

參閱靜態查詢的專用遷移指南。

See the dedicated migration guide for static queries.

@ContentChild() / @Input() 一起使用link

@ContentChild() / @Input() used togetherlink

以下模式已棄用：

The following pattern is deprecated:

@Input() @ContentChild(TemplateRef) tpldeprecated !: TemplateRef<any>;

不要再使用此模式，而應該將這兩個裝飾器分離到它們各自的屬性中並添加回退邏輯，如下例所示：

Rather than using this pattern, separate the two decorators into their own properties and add fallback logic as in the following example:

@Input() tpl !: TemplateRef<any>; @ContentChild(TemplateRef) inlineTemplate !: TemplateRef<any>;

無法賦值給範本變數link

Cannot assign to template variableslink

在以下範例中，雙向繫結意味著應在 valueChange 事件觸發時寫入 optionName。

In the following example, the two-way binding means that optionName should be written when the valueChange event fires.

<option *ngFor="let optionName of options" [(value)]="optionName"></option>

然而，在實踐中，Angular 忽略了對範本變數的雙向繫結。從版本 8 開始，不推薦對範本變數賦值。在未來的版本中，我們將丟擲錯誤以指出不支援寫入。

However, in practice, Angular ignores two-way bindings to template variables. Starting in version 8, attempting to write to template variables is deprecated. In a future version, we will throw to indicate that the write is not supported.

<option *ngFor="let optionName of options" [value]="optionName"></option>

在 platform-server 中繫結到 innerTextlink

Binding to innerText in platform-serverlink

在伺服器端渲染中使用的 Domino 不支援 innerText，因此在平台伺服器中的 “domino 介面卡”中，如果嘗試繫結到 innerText，則有一些特殊程式碼可以退回到 textContent。

Domino, which is used in server-side rendering, doesn't support innerText, so in platform-server's domino adapter, there was special code to fall back to textContent if you tried to bind to innerText.

這兩個屬性有細微的差別，因此在幕後切換到 textContent 可能會讓使用者感到驚訝。出於這個原因，我們棄用了這種行為。展望未來，使用者應該在使用 Domino 時顯式繫結到 textContent。

These two properties have subtle differences, so switching to textContent under the hood can be surprising to users. For this reason, we are deprecating this behavior. Going forward, users should explicitly bind to textContent when using Domino.

wtfStartTimeRange 和所有 wtf* APIlink

wtfStartTimeRange and all wtf* APIslink

所有 wtf* API 均已棄用，並將在未來版本中刪除。

All of the wtf* APIs are deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

不再需要 entryComponents 和 ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTSlink

entryComponents and ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS no longer requiredlink

以前，NgModule 定義中的 entryComponents 陣列用於告訴編譯器將動態建立和插入哪些元件。使用 Ivy 後，這不再是必需的，並且可以從現有模組宣告中刪除 entryComponents 陣列。這同樣適用於 ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS 注入令牌。

Previously, the entryComponents array in the NgModule definition was used to tell the compiler which components would be created and inserted dynamically. With Ivy, this isn't a requirement anymore and the entryComponents array can be removed from existing module declarations. The same applies to the ANALYZE_FOR_ENTRY_COMPONENTS injection token.

注意：
如果建構將由 View Engine 應用程式使用的函式庫，你可能仍然需要保留這些。

NOTE:
You may still need to keep these if building a library that will be consumed by a View Engine application.

不帶泛型的 ModuleWithProviders 型別link

ModuleWithProviders type without a genericlink

一些 Angular 庫，比如 @angular/router 和 @ngrx/store，實現的 API 返回名為 ModuleWithProviders 的型別（通常使用名為 ModuleWithProviders forRoot() 的方法）。這種型別代表一個 NgModule 以及其他提供者。Angular 版本 9 已棄用沒有明確泛型型別的 NgModule ModuleWithProviders 型別。在 Angular 的未來版本中，泛型將不再是可選的。

Some Angular libraries, such as @angular/router and @ngrx/store, implement APIs that return a type called ModuleWithProviders (typically using a method named forRoot()). This type represents an NgModule along with additional providers. Angular version 9 deprecates use of ModuleWithProviders without an explicitly generic type, where the generic type refers to the type of the NgModule. In a future version of Angular, the generic will no longer be optional.

如果你使用的是 CLI，則 ng update 應該會自動遷移程式碼。如果沒有使用 CLI，則可以將任何缺失的泛型型別手動新增到應用程式中。比如：

If you're using the CLI, ng update should migrate your code automatically. If you're not using the CLI, you can add any missing generic types to your application manually. For example:

之前：

Before:

@NgModule({ /* ... */ }) export class MyModule { static forRoot(config: SomeConfig): ModuleWithProviders { return { ngModule: SomeModule, providers: [ {provide: SomeConfig, useValue: config} ] }; } }

之後：

After:

@NgModule({ /* ... */ }) export class MyModule { static forRoot(config: SomeConfig): ModuleWithProviders<SomeModule> { return { ngModule: SomeModule, providers: [ {provide: SomeConfig, useValue: config} ] }; } }

輸入 setter 強制型別轉換link

Input setter coercionlink

由於在 Angular 中引入了 strictTemplates 標誌，編譯器已經能夠根據相應指令的宣告輸入型別對輸入繫結進行型別檢查。當 “getter/setter 對”用於輸入時，可能需要讓 setter 接受比 getter 返回的型別更寬泛的型別集，比如當 setter 首次轉換輸入值時。然而，在 TypeScript 4.3 之前，需要 getter/setter 對具有相同的型別，因此無法準確地宣告此模式。

Since the strictTemplates flag has been introduced in Angular, the compiler has been able to type-check input bindings to the declared input type of the corresponding directive. When a getter/setter pair is used for the input, the setter might need to accept more types than the getter returns, such as when the setter first converts the input value. However, until TypeScript 4.3 a getter/setter pair was required to have identical types so this pattern could not be accurately declared.

為了減輕這種限制，可以在對輸入繫結進行型別檢查時用到的指令中宣告輸入 setter 強制型別轉換欄位。但是，從 TypeScript 4.3 開始，此限制已被移除； setter 現在可以接受比 getter 返回的型別更寬泛的型別。這意味著不再需要輸入強制型別轉換欄位，因為它們的效果可以透過拓寬 setter 的型別來實現。

To mitigate this limitation, it was made possible to declare input setter coercion fields in directives that are used when type-checking input bindings. However, since TypeScript 4.3 the limitation has been removed; setters can now accept a wider type than what is returned by the getter. This means that input coercion fields are no longer needed, as their effects can be achieved by widening the type of the setter.

比如，以下指令：

For example, the following directive:

@Component({ }) export class SubmitButtonComponent { static ngAcceptInputType_disabled: boolean|''; private disabledValue = false; @Input() get disabled(): boolean { return this.disabledValue; } set disabled(value: boolean) { this.disabledValue = (value === '') || value; } }

可以重構如下：

can be refactored as follows:

@Component({ }) export class SubmitButtonComponent { private disabledValue = false; @Input() get disabled(): boolean { return this.disabledValue; } set disabled(value: boolean|'') { this.disabledValue = (value === '') || value; } }

fullTemplateTypeChecklink

使用 AOT 編譯器編譯你的應用程式時，你的範本會根據特定的嚴格級別進行型別檢查。在 Angular 9 之前，fullTemplateTypeCheck 編譯器選項只支援兩個嚴格級別的範本型別檢查。在版本 9 中引入了 strictTemplates 系列編譯器選項，作為一種更細粒度的方法來配置範本的型別檢查的嚴格程度。

When compiling your application using the AOT compiler, your templates are type-checked according to a certain strictness level. Before Angular 9 there existed only two strictness levels of template type checking as determined by the fullTemplateTypeCheck compiler option. In version 9 the strictTemplates family of compiler options has been introduced as a more fine-grained approach to configuring how strict your templates are being type-checked.

fullTemplateTypeCheck 標誌已被棄用，取代它的是新的 strictTemplates 選項及其相關的編譯器選項。當前已配置為 fullTemplateTypeCheck: true 的專案可以遷移到以下編譯器選項集以實現相同級別的型別檢查：

The fullTemplateTypeCheck flag is being deprecated in favor of the new strictTemplates option and its related compiler options. Projects that currently have fullTemplateTypeCheck: true configured can migrate to the following set of compiler options to achieve the same level of type-checking:

{ "angularCompilerOptions": { … "strictTemplates": true, "strictInputTypes": false, "strictNullInputTypes": false, "strictAttributeTypes": false, "strictOutputEventTypes": false, "strictDomEventTypes": false, "strictDomLocalRefTypes": false, "strictSafeNavigationTypes": false, "strictContextGenerics": false, … } }

由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改link

JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecationlink

在 ViewEngine 中，JIT 編譯需要在應用程式中注入特殊的提供者（如 Compiler、CompilerFactory 等）並呼叫相應的方法。使用 Ivy，如果 Component、NgModule 等尚未進行 AOT 編譯，則 JIT 編譯會隱含進行。這些特殊的提供者在 Ivy 中仍然可用，以便與 ViewEngine 向後相容，從而使向 Ivy 的過渡更加順暢。由於 ViewEngine 已被棄用並將很快被刪除，因此這些符號現在也已被棄用。

In ViewEngine, JIT compilation required special providers (such as Compiler or CompilerFactory) to be injected in the app and corresponding methods to be invoked. With Ivy, JIT compilation takes place implicitly if the Component, NgModule, etc. have not already been AOT compiled. Those special providers were made available in Ivy for backwards-compatibility with ViewEngine to make the transition to Ivy smoother. Since ViewEngine is deprecated and will soon be removed, those symbols are now deprecated as well.

重要：
此棄用不會影響 Ivy 中的 JIT 模式（JIT 在 Ivy 中仍然可用，但是我們正在探索將來棄用它的可能性。參閱 RFC：Angular JIT 編譯模式的使用案例探索）。

IMPORTANT:
this deprecation doesn't affect JIT mode in Ivy (JIT remains available with Ivy, however we are exploring a possibility of deprecating it in the future. See RFC: Exploration of use-cases for Angular JIT compilation mode).

TestRequest 接受 ErrorEvent 引數link

TestRequest accepting ErrorEventlink

Angular 提供了一些用於測試 HttpClient 的實用工具。@angular/common/http/testing 中的 TestRequest 類會模擬 HTTP 請求物件以與 HttpTestingController 一起使用。

Angular provides utilities for testing HttpClient. The TestRequest class from @angular/common/http/testing mocks HTTP request objects for use with HttpTestingController.

TestRequest 提供了一個 API 來模擬帶有錯誤的 HTTP 響應。在早期版本的 Angular 中，此 API 接受 ErrorEvent 型別的物件，這與瀏覽器本機返回的錯誤事件型別不匹配。如果你要將 ErrorEvent 與 TestRequest 一起使用，就應該切換到 ProgressEvent。

TestRequest provides an API for simulating an HTTP response with an error. In earlier versions of Angular, this API accepted objects of type ErrorEvent, which does not match the type of error event that browsers return natively. If you use ErrorEvent with TestRequest, you should switch to ProgressEvent.

這是使用 ProgressEvent 的範例：

Here is an example using a ProgressEvent:

const mockError = new ProgressEvent('error'); const mockRequest = httpTestingController.expectOne(..); mockRequest.error(mockError);

棄用的 CLI API 和選項link

Deprecated CLI APIs and Optionslink

本節包含所有當前已棄用的 CLI 標誌的完整列表。

This section contains a complete list all of the currently deprecated CLI flags.

@angular-devkit/build-angularlink

API/選項API/Option 可能會在May be removed in 詳情Details
deployUrl v15 使用 baseHref 選項、 APP_BASE_HREF DI 令牌或兩者的組合。有關更多資訊，參閱部署 url。Use baseHref option, APP_BASE_HREF DI token or a combination of both instead. For more information, see the deploy url.
Protractor 建構器Protractor builder v14 作為 Protractor 棄用的一部分而棄用。Deprecate as part of the Protractor deprecation.

刪除的 APIlink

Removed APIslink

從 11.0.0*開始，已經移除了以下 API：

The following APIs have been removed starting with version 11.0.0*:

套件Package API 替代品Replacement 詳情Details
@angular/router preserveQueryParams queryParamsHandling

* 要檢視版本 10 中移除的 API，請檢視 版本 10 文件站點上的本指南。

* To see APIs removed in version 10, check out this guide on the version 10 docs site.

[style] 和 [style.prop] 繫結的樣式清理link

Style Sanitization for [style] and [style.prop] bindingslink

Angular 會清理 [style] 和 [style.prop] 繫結，以防止惡意程式碼透過 CSS url() 條目中的 javascript: 表示式進行插入。但是，大多數現代瀏覽器都已不再支援這些表示式的使用，所以這種清理只對 IE 6 和 7 才有意義。鑑於 Angular 不支援 IE 6 或 7，並且這種清理有效能代價，因此我們將不再清理 Angular 版本 10 中的樣式繫結。

Angular used to sanitize [style] and [style.prop] bindings to prevent malicious code from being inserted through javascript: expressions in CSS url() entries. However, most modern browsers no longer support the usage of these expressions, so sanitization was only maintained for the sake of IE 6 and 7. Given that Angular does not support either IE 6 or 7 and sanitization has a performance cost, we will no longer sanitize style bindings as of version 10 of Angular.

@angular/router 中的 loadChildren 字串語法link

loadChildren string syntax in @angular/routerlink

不能再用 loadChildren 字串語法來配置惰性路由。字串語法已替換為動態匯入陳述式。DeprecatedLoadChildren 型別已從 @angular/router 中刪除。在 LoadChildrenCallback 文件中查詢有關本替換的更多資訊。

It is no longer possible to use the loadChildren string syntax to configure lazy routes. The string syntax has been replaced with dynamic import statements. The DeprecatedLoadChildren type was removed from @angular/router. Find more information about the replacement in the LoadChildrenCallback documentation.

支援類 NgModuleFactoryLoader 、 SystemJsNgModuleLoader 和 SystemJsNgModuleLoaderConfig 類已從 @angular/core 中刪除，並且 SpyNgModuleFactoryLoader 已從 @angular/router 中刪除。

The supporting classes NgModuleFactoryLoader, SystemJsNgModuleLoader, and SystemJsNgModuleLoaderConfig were removed from @angular/core, as well as SpyNgModuleFactoryLoader from @angular/router.

WrappedValuelink

WrappedValue 是為了供變更檢測用的，它允許將相同的物件例項視為不同的。在 Observable 產生相同值例項的情況下，它通常與 async 管道一起使用。

The purpose of WrappedValue was to allow the same object instance to be treated as different for the purposes of change detection. It was commonly used with the async pipe in the case where the Observable produces the same instance of the value.

鑑於此使用案例相對較少且特殊處理會影響應用程式效能，WrappedValue API 已在 Angular 13 中刪除。

Given that this use case is relatively rare and special handling impacted application performance, the WrappedValue API has been removed in Angular 13.

如果你依賴同一個物件例項應該引起變更檢測的行為，你有兩個選擇：

If you rely on the behavior that the same object instance should cause change detection, you have two options:

  • 複製結果值，使其具有新的標識。

    Clone the resulting value so that it has a new identity

  • 顯式呼叫ChangeDetectorRef.detectChanges()以強制更新

    Explicitly call ChangeDetectorRef.detectChanges() to force the update

最後複查時間： 2/28/2022
